div.div: Difference in CH 4 optical depths between RTMIP experiments 3b and 3d.
div.p: Green line: Optical depth differences from HITRAN 2012; orange and red lines: optical depth differences computed using the Jovian empirical spectra added to the HITRAN 2012 results for wave numbers below and above 12,000 cm âˆ’1, respectively (see Materials and Methods).
